column1: Little Goat Diner////Was here pre-covid with a friend and had a really positive experience--great food
column3: and service. I ordered the "This Little Piggy Went to China" and we split the pork belly fries. The former was really good; it's essentially a cheddar sesame biscuit with a sunny side up egg
column5: and chili garlic chive sauce. The sauce was slightly overpowering and too sweet for my taste
column6: but the rest of the dish was delicious. The pork belly fries--amazing. Couldn't stop eating them
column7: they were so perfectly crisp and essentially just an elevated form of poutine. They come with pork belly
column10: and a sort of fish sauce turned cream vinaigrette. Sounds weird but they were truly amazing.
